teamMembers.name: Sarah Mitchell
teamMembers.title: Senior Loan Officer
teamMembers.bio: Sarah has been serving the New York market for 12 years, specializing in residential mortgages and jumbo loans. She's helped over 800 families find their perfect home in the NYC area.

teamMembers.name: Marcus Johnson
teamMembers.title: Commercial Lending Specialist
teamMembers.bio: Marcus specializes in commercial real estate financing for NYC-based businesses. With 15 years in the industry, he's closed over 200 commercial deals.

teamMembers.name: Jennifer Chen
teamMembers.title: Non-QM Specialist
teamMembers.bio: Jennifer specializes in non-traditional loan programs for self-employed borrowers and investors. She's helped over 350 entrepreneurs and business owners achieve their real estate goals.

teamMembers.name: Robert Diaz
teamMembers.title: Pre-Qualification Manager
teamMembers.bio: Robert leads our pre-qualification team and ensures every borrower gets personalized attention from day one. He's known for his quick turnaround times and borrower-first approach.

marketInfo.marketDescription: The New York metropolitan area is one of the nation's most competitive real estate markets. CMRE has been a trusted lending partner for 18 years, serving individuals, families, and business owners throughout Manhattan, Brooklyn, Queens, and the surrounding areas.

testimonials.quote: Sarah and her team made the entire process smooth and stress-free. They found us the perfect loan program for our jumbo property and closed in record time. Highly recommend!
As a self-employed business owner, I thought getting a mortgage would be impossible. Marcus and Jennifer showed me multiple options and I closed on my investment property within 45 days!
CMRE's team understands the New York market better than anyone. They navigated the complexities of our commercial deal with expertise and professionalism.

faqItems.question: What programs are available for borrowers in New York?
faqItems.answer: We offer 165+ loan programs in the New York area, including FHA mortgages, conventional loans, jumbo loans, SBA commercial financing, and specialized non-QM programs for self-employed borrowers. Our team can help you find the perfect program for your situation.

faqItems.question: What's the average approval time for New York borrowers?
faqItems.answer: Most of our borrowers receive approval within 5-7 business days. Our streamlined process and local expertise help us close faster than industry averages. Pre-approval can happen in as little as 24 hours.

faqItems.question: What are typical interest rates for loans in New York?
faqItems.answer: Interest rates vary based on program type, credit score, and loan amount. Conventional mortgages in our market typically range from 5.5%-6.5%, while jumbo loans range from 6.5%-7.5%. We encourage you to get a personalized quote from our team.

faqItems.question: Can CMRE finance co-op apartments in New York?
faqItems.answer: Yes! We have specialized programs for co-op financing. Our jumbo loan products work particularly well for high-value co-op purchases. Speak with our team for specific details about your co-op purchase.

faqItems.question: What credit score do I need to qualify?
faqItems.answer: Credit score requirements vary by program. FHA loans require 580+, conventional loans typically require 700+, and jumbo loans require 720+. We also offer specialized programs for borrowers with lower credit scores. Our team can review your situation.

faqItems.question: How do I get started with pre-qualification?
faqItems.answer: You can start online in just 5 minutes at cmre.com/pre-qualify, or contact our New York team directly at (212) 555-0100 to speak with a specialist who can guide you through the process.
